LanguageData.DesignatorCancelDesc: Cancel designated building, mining, hauling, harvesting, and all other designations.
LanguageData.DesignatorCutPlantsDesc: Atzīmē augus ko nogriezt vai iznīcināt. Augs tiks pilnībā iznīcināts, un ēdiens savākts.
LanguageData.DesignatorDeconstructDesc: Nojaukt objektus un savākt daļu no to resursiem.
LanguageData.DesignatorHarvestDesc: Atzīmēt augus lai tos novāktu Marks plants to be harvested for their food or other products.
LanguageData.DesignatorHaulThingsDesc: Mark rock chunks and other items to be hauled to dumping areas. Not needed for things like food or corpses, which are always haulable.
LanguageData.MustHaulHaulables: Var atzīmēt tikai objektus kam nav funkcijas, piemeram, akmens gabalus.
LanguageData.DesignatorHuntDesc: Iezīmēt dzīvniekus kurus medīs jūsu mednieki.
LanguageData.DesignatorMineDesc: Iezīmēt reģionu no akmens, kas paredzēts rakšanai.
LanguageData.DesignatorSmoothFloorDesc: Designate rough stone floors to be smoothed.
LanguageData.DesignatorPlanDesc: Place planning designations. These don't do anything except help you plan future expansions.
LanguageData.DesignatorHomeRegionAddDesc: Colonists will repair buildings, clean floors, and extinguish fires only in the home region.
LanguageData.DesignatorHomeRegionRemoveDesc: Removes a home region. Colonists will no longer clean, repair, or extinguish fires here.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionNoRoofAddDesc: Create a region where roofs will not generate. Colonists will also tear down existing roofs here.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionNoRoofRemoveDesc: Removes a no-roof region. Roofs will generate here, and existing roofs will not be torn down.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionSnowClearAddDesc: Izveidot reģionu kuru kolonisti centīsies attīrīt no sniega.
LanguageData.DesignatorRegionSnowClearRemoveDesc: Removes a snow clearing. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow.
LanguageData.DesignatorGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageResourcesDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store resources.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageDumpingDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store junk.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneDeleteDesc: Dzēst reģionus kā krātuvi vai audzēšanas reģionu.
LanguageData.DesignatorClaimDesc: Piesavināt neitrālas ēkas savai kolonijai,ieskaitot senas drupas un pamestas kara bāzes. Piesavinātas ēkas var tikt salabotas un sakoptas ar jūsu kolonistu palīdzību.
LanguageData.InteractionSpotOutOfBounds: Interaction spot is out of bounds.
LanguageData.InteractionSpotWillBeBlocked: Interaction spot will be blocked by {0}.
LanguageData.TerrainCannotSupport: The terrain here cannot support this.
